summary: This document is an email transmitting a lieutenant's log and daily activities report for July 6, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It appears to be routine administrative reporting from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the time, shortly before his death.

events.title: Daily activities at MCC New York
events.description: Routine lieutenant's log and daily activities report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

keyFacts: Document is a routine administrative report from MCC New York dated July 6, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC New York at this time (July 2019).
The report was created just weeks before Epstein's death in August 2019.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text excerpt.
Document shows normal operational reporting from the correctional facility.
